title: harahara siva palaya
sahitya:
hara hara shiva pAlaya mAm iti vada vada rE rasanE satatam

anupallavi

 paramEshvara parama dayAkara para sukhada parAtpara shankara

caraNam

 atulAbha vihAyasa kEsha mati mOhana rUpa mahEsha 
dhrta hariNapurEsha girIsha citapAtaka nikara vinAsha

madhyama kAlam

vara tApasa sancaya pUjita vacanAdhika mahasA pUrita 
varada vibhO pannaga bhUSita vana tulasIvilva dalArcita
